name: Tadej Francelj
description: Tadej Francelj, Lawyer I Business developer I Blockchain & Fintech I Finance & Banking I Data Privacy holds the position of CEO for 1nance project.

name: Tiago Moura deOliveira
description: Tiago Moura de Oliveira, a holder of a degree in Financial Management, has consolidated professional expertise and knowledge in the Logistics / Distribution / Purchasing and Warehousing gained from working in various sectors and multicultural environments. He has a track record in team building, relationship management, continuous improvement processes resulting in successful teams and top organisational performance.

name: Dennis Han
description: As an experienced developer, professional with seasoned leadership and relationship building skills, Dennis Han has strong experience in developing Decentralized Blockchain applications using Ethereum and Hyper ledger. A young and fast-growing blockchain expert and senior software engineer with a Master’s degree in Computer Science from The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology(HKUST), always focusing on how to get rid of the vulnerabilities of the DApps we build and to serve higher transaction speed and lower gas. Contributed and participated in many projects in DeFi and NFT fields like CronaSwap, SphynxSwap, Solkitties, etc.

name: Daniel R
description: Danial supports 1nance project with the role of Disruptive & Growth, Strategy Advisor,| Digital & Tech, COO, MCT and Reforge alumni.

name: Akhil P Vijay
description: Akhil P Vijay’s favorite programming language is Python (though I also have experience in R). The main libraries I use are Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, stats models, Matplotlib, Seaborn, SciPy. He is proficient in several machine learning algorithms, both supervised and unsupervised. These include linear regression, logistic regression and polynomial regression and currently passionately pursuing knowledge further.

name: Rosa L
description: Rosa Liu, who graduated Carnegie Mellon University is a Strategies And Operations Manager at Workrise.
